DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate effect FID 114657 tear film lipid layer thickness patient dry eye .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation FID 114657 Tear Film Lipid Layer Thickness
DOC.criteria: Informed consent document HIPAA privacy document must read , sign dated patient legally authorize representative conducting procedure . Patients ( minimum age 18 ) dry eye . Criteria diagnosis must include follow characteristic : Positive response question , `` Do ever feel eye ? `` ; Baseline LLT value ≤75nm ( OU ) , vary ±15 nm course 10minute observation period , difference LLT two eye must ≤15nm , increase LLT three forceful blink must ≤15nm . Patients must bestcorrected Snellen visual acuity 20/70 good eye . Able willing follow study instruction . Use topical ocular drop within 12 hour study visit ; use topical ocular ointment within 36 hour study visit . In addition , use concomitant topical ocular drug study period . History evidence ocular intraocular surgery either eye within past six month . History evidence serious ocular trauma either eye within past six month . History intolerance hypersensitivity component study medication . History and/or current evidence glaucoma ocular hypertension either eye . History and/or current evidence active intraocular inflammation either eye ( i.e. , retina/macula/choroid ) . History evidence epithelial herpes simplex keratitis ( dendritic keratitis ) ; vaccinia ; active recent varicella viral disease cornea and/or conjunctiva ; ocular rosacea ; chronic bacterial disease cornea and/or conjunctiva and/or eyelid ; mycobacterial infection eye ; and/or fungal disease eye . Ocular condition active acute blepharitis , conjunctival infection , iritis , conjunctival abnormality ( include pinguecula great 1mm diameter , locate closer 2mm limbus elevate 0.2mm ) , eyelid abnormality ( include entropion ectropion ) ocular condition may , opinion investigator , preclude safe administration test article . Patients use systemic medication may contribute dry eye ( e.g . cold allergy medication , tricyclic antidepressant , hormone replacement therapy ) may enrol study unless stable dose regimen minimum 30 day prior study visit . Any ocular systemic medical condition might influence tear film ( dry eye ) . Individuals unwilling discontinue contact lens wear study period . Contact lens wear must discontinue minimum 12 hour prior study visit . Individuals unwilling discontinue use cosmetic ( eyeliner , mascara eye shadow ) facial cream around eyelid day study . Participation investigational drug device study within 30 day enter study .
